languages.text: Миры-святыни — сокровища Империума, драгоценности духа, что сияют во тьме. Чтобы Фолстоун обрел регалии мира-святыни, потребуется океан тронов на взятки алчным чиновникам Экклезиархии, а также горы редчайших материалов для возведения достойных сего статуса соборов. Но, добившись такого успеха, династия фон Валанциус обретет престиж и вечную признательность Ордена Молота.

Shrine worlds are treasures of the Imperium, spiritual gems shining in the darkness. For Foulstone to become a shrine world will require an ocean's worth of thrones in bribes to greedy Ecclesiarchy officials, as well as mountains of extremely rare materials to erect cathedrals worthy of the status. However, succeeding will give House von Valancius prestige and the Order of the Hammer's eternal gratitude.
languages.original_text: Миры-святыни — сокровища Империума, драгоценности духа, что сияют во тьме. Чтобы Фолстоун обрел регалии мира-святыни, потребуется океан тронов на взятки алчным чиновникам Экклезиархии, а также горы редчайших материалов для возведения достойных сего статуса соборов. Но, добившись такого успеха, династия фон Валанциус обретет престиж и вечную признательность Ордена Молота.

For Foulstone to become a Shrine World will require an ocean's worth of thrones in bribes to greedy Ecclesiarchy officials, as well as mountains of extremely rare materials to erect cathedrals worthy of the status. But succeeding will give House von Valancius prestige and the Order of the Hammer's eternal gratitude.

Shrine worlds are treasures of the Imperium, spiritual gems shining in the darkness. For Foulstone to become a shrine world will require an ocean's worth of thrones in bribes to greedy Ecclesiarchy officials, as well as mountains of extremely rare materials to erect cathedrals worthy of the status. However, succeeding will give House von Valancius prestige and the Order of the Hammer's eternal gratitude.

languages.text: Los mundos templo son tesoros del Imperium, joyas espirituales que brillan en la oscuridad. Para que Rocainmunda se una a las filas de los mundos templo hará falta un mar de tronos a modo de sobornos para funcionarios de la Eclesiarquía, así como montañas de materiales escasos para erigir catedrales dignas de semejante estatus. Sin embargo, el éxito traerá a la casa von Valancius un gran prestigio y la gratitud eterna de la Orden del Martillo.
languages.original_text: Shrine worlds are treasures of the Imperium, spiritual gems shining in the darkness. For Foulstone to become a shrine world will require an ocean's worth of thrones in bribes to greedy Ecclesiarchy officials, as well as mountains of extremely rare materials to erect cathedrals worthy of the status. However, succeeding will give House von Valancius prestige and the Order of the Hammer's eternal gratitude.

traits.locale_text: Los mundos templo son tesoros del Imperium, joyas espirituales que brillan en la oscuridad. Para que Rocainmunda se una a las filas de los mundos templo hará falta un mar de tronos a modo de sobornos para funcionarios de la Eclesiarquía, así como montañas de materiales escasos para erigir catedrales dignas de semejante estatus. Sin embargo, el éxito traerá a la casa von Valancius un gran prestigio y la gratitud eterna de la Orden del Martillo.

languages.text: Les mondes sanctuaires sont des trésors de l'Imperium, des joyaux spirituels brillant dans les ténèbres. Si Rochepeste veut prétendre à ce statut, il faudra verser des océans de pots-de-vin aux fonctionnaires cupides de l'Ecclésiarchie et réquisitionner des montagnes de matériaux rares pour ériger des cathédrales dignes de cet honneur. Toutefois, une telle consécration assurerait le prestige de la maison von Valancius et la reconnaissance éternelle de l'Ordre du Marteau.
languages.original_text: Shrine worlds are treasures of the Imperium, spiritual gems shining in the darkness. For Foulstone to become a shrine world will require an ocean's worth of thrones in bribes to greedy Ecclesiarchy officials, as well as mountains of extremely rare materials to erect cathedrals worthy of the status. However, succeeding will give House von Valancius prestige and the Order of the Hammer's eternal gratitude.

traits.locale_text: Les mondes-sanctuaires sont des trésors de l'Imperium, des joyaux spirituels brillant dans les ténèbres. Si Rochepeste veut prétendre à ce statut, il faudra verser des océans de pots-de-vin aux fonctionnaires cupides de l'Ecclésiarchie et réquisitionner des montagnes de matériaux rares pour ériger des cathédrales dignes de cet honneur. Toutefois, une telle consécration assurerait le prestige de la maison von Valancius et la reconnaissance éternelle de l'Ordre du Marteau.

languages.text: 神殿世界是帝国的瑰宝，是黑暗中闪耀的心灵至宝。若想让荒寂岩地发展为神殿世界，既要以盈箱累箧的金银贿赂贪婪的国教官员，又要以浩如烟海的稀有材料，堆出一座名副其实的宏伟教堂。不过，只要计划成功，冯·瓦兰修斯家族必将扬名寰宇，同时赢得重锤修会矢志不忘的感恩。
languages.original_text: Shrine worlds are treasures of the Imperium, spiritual gems shining in the darkness. For Foulstone to become a shrine world will require an ocean's worth of thrones in bribes to greedy Ecclesiarchy officials, as well as mountains of extremely rare materials to erect cathedrals worthy of the status. However, succeeding will give House von Valancius prestige and the Order of the Hammer's eternal gratitude.

traits.locale_text: 神殿世界是帝国的瑰宝，是黑暗中闪耀的心灵至宝。若想让荒寂岩地发展为神殿世界，既要以盈箱累箧的金银贿赂贪婪的国教官员，又要以浩如烟海的稀有材料，堆出一座名副其实的宏伟教堂。不过，只要计划成功，冯·瓦兰修斯家族必将扬名寰宇，同时赢得圣锤修会矢志不忘的感恩。

languages.text: 礼拝惑星は帝国の宝であり、闇の中で輝く霊的な宝石だ。ファウルストーンが礼拝惑星になるには、強欲なな帝国聖教会の役人への賄賂として大洋に匹敵するほどの価値ある玉座が必要であり、その地位にふさわしい聖堂を建てるための極めて希少な資材の山も必要となる。しかし、成功すればフォン・ヴァランシウス家の名声と鉄槌の修道会の永遠の感謝を得ることができるだろう。
languages.original_text: Shrine worlds are treasures of the Imperium, spiritual gems shining in the darkness. For Foulstone to become a shrine world will require an ocean's worth of thrones in bribes to greedy Ecclesiarchy officials, as well as mountains of extremely rare materials to erect cathedrals worthy of the status. However, succeeding will give House von Valancius prestige and the Order of the Hammer's eternal gratitude.

traits.locale_text: 礼拝惑星は帝国の宝であり、闇の中で輝く霊的な宝石だ。ファウルストーンが礼拝惑星になるには、強欲なな帝国聖教会の役人への賄賂として大洋に匹敵するほどの価値ある玉座が必要であり、その地位にふさわしい聖堂を建てるための極めて希少な資材の山も必要となる。しかし、成功すればフォン・ヴァランシウス家の名声と鉄槌の修道会の永遠の感謝を得ることができるだろう。

languages.text: Schreinwelten sind Schätze des Imperiums, spirituelle Juwelen, die in der Dunkelheit leuchten. Damit Foulstone zur Schreinwelt wird, ist ein Ozean von Thronmünzen an Bestechungsgeldern für gierige Beamte der Ekklesiarchie nötig, dazu Berge an extrem seltenen Materialien, um Kathedralen zu errichten, die dieses Status würdig sind. Wenn das Vorhaben aber vom Erfolg gekrönt ist, bringt das dem Haus Valancius Ansehen und den ewigen Dank des Ordens des Hammers ein.
languages.original_text: Shrine worlds are treasures of the Imperium, spiritual gems shining in the darkness. For Foulstone to become a shrine world will require an ocean's worth of thrones in bribes to greedy Ecclesiarchy officials, as well as mountains of extremely rare materials to erect cathedrals worthy of the status. However, succeeding will give House von Valancius prestige and the Order of the Hammer's eternal gratitude.
